Morning Signout Settings Good Morning! Here! Refresh Latest articles and images Article Image The author of the journals A flash of blinding light engulfs all of Gravity Falls. Then, everything comes down to earth. The portal, now a mess of tangled wires and metal, glows bright blue. A figure emerges from the portal. The blue light fades behind him. He walks forward, placing a six-fingered hand on the cover of the first journal, then picks it up and places it into the inside pocket of a long, dark coat.
